tourName: Cape Town Vacation for Lovers: Most Romantic Destinations
generalInfo: The Western Cape province of South Africa is a diverse region that is teeming with picturesque landscapes and magnificent mountain ranges. The heart of the province, Cape Town, is a sophisticated city that is nestled at the base of the towering Table Mountain. It is surrounded by pristine Blue Flag beaches and far-stretching green Winelands. On this intimate 8-day expedition, you and your partner will enjoy a luxurious tour of the city’s prestigious landmarks and enchanting destinations. Together, soak up the serene scenic splendor and tuck into revered South African cuisine. You will capture lifelong memories on this unforgettably authentic and romantic tour Cape Town that is sure to be remembered forever.

dayInfo.title: Cape Town – Capture Memories from Great Heights
dayInfo.description: Upon arrival at Cape Town International Airport, you will be welcomed by the warm African sun. After collecting your things, you will meet your private transfer for a scenic drive to your first destination where you will witness the wondrous region in all its glory as you comfortably journey to the heart of the city. Table Mountain stands mightily tall in the middle of Cape Town, with roads and buildings that are wrapped around its base. You will transfer around the mountain and through the bustling streets as you travel to the pristine Camps Bay area. Camps Bay is renowned for its premier restaurants and luxurious beach. Here, you will explore the stylish cultural scene and tuck into delicious cuisine. You will arrive at your lavish 5-star accommodation that overlooks the ocean, and your intimate suite will offer breathtaking views from the comfort of your private balcony. Furthermore, your elegant hotel boasts first-class amenities to enjoy when you return from your romantic adventures. Once you have made yourselves comfortable, you will journey to the V&A Waterfront for a charming afternoon. The fashionable waterfront boasts opulent stores and extravagant restaurants, and you will enjoy exploring the surrounding area, purchasing high-end items and fine-dining on immaculate cuisine. After which, you will visit Cape Town’s leading contemporary African art museum where the amazing pieces will inspire and fill you with great admiration for African art. The displays will be immersive and engaging, keeping you thoroughly entertained throughout. After the rich, cultural discovery of African art, you will transfer to the base of the magnificent Table Mountain. A Cable Car will lift you into the sky as you reach for the top of the mountain. Once you arrive, you will be met with endless views of the Western Cape. You and your loved one will capture unforgettable moments together as you gaze upon the vibrant city below. As the sun begins to set, you will make yourselves comfortable at a gourmet cafe on top of the mountain. With sushi platters, fine wines, and South African cheese boards on the menu, you will delight in the romantic dining experience on top of the world. Afterward, you will make your way down the mountain and transfer back to your peaceful room on the shores of the city’s elite seaside suburb.

dayInfo.title: Cape Town – An Endearing Day of Nature and Culture
dayInfo.description: The morning markets that are sprawled in abundance across the city streets will offer an enchanting way to start your day. You may choose to delve into your hotel’s sumptuous breakfast spread or save space for the delicate treats that you will discover at the market. You will meet your private transfer who will take you to Cape Town’s foremost boutique farmers market. The eco-conscious market is home to an assortment of local businesses. Weaving your way through the bustling stalls, you will have the opportunity to taste exquisitely seasoned Biltong , which is South African cured and dried meat, and meticulously crafted traditional tarts. These will be but a few of the delightful foods on offer at this pleasantly friendly and exuberant market. Furthermore, the experience will be accompanied by breathtaking views of the ocean. You and your partner will delight in authentic South African delicacies as you take in this scenic splendor. From here, you will venture to the city’s national botanical gardens that are nestled at the base of Table Mountain. The striking park is home to thousands of indigenous plants and an array of wonderful wildlife. It is an immense garden with winding paths that will lead you to picturesque settings. The stunning Protea garden, for example, offers an exemplary display of the country’s national flower and plant family, and the Centenary Tree Canopy Walkway will take you from the forest floor up above the canopy for panoramic views of the gardens and mountain range. With a picnic basket full of delightful snacks and a comfortable blanket to rest on, you will spend the morning leisurely soaking up the sun. Later today, you will transfer to Signal Hill for a remarkable sunset spectacle. As the setting sun illuminates the sky, paragliders will leap from the great heights and soar to the mountain floor. You will marvel at the endearing sights before returning to your hotel. From your hotel, you will transfer to one of Cape Town’s eloquent theatres where a remarkable performance will provide enthralling entertainment while the elegant establishment serves you and your loved one an excellent meal. This genuinely romantic night out will perfectly round off your day of adventure.

dayInfo.title: Cape Town – The Western Cape Coastline at its Finest
dayInfo.description: You will begin your day with an exquisite breakfast at your hotel. After which, you will transfer to the vibrant Old Biscuit Mill in the heart of the Woodstock area. A thriving hub of local design and cuisine, the destination will warmly capture Cape Town’s talented cultural scene. Amid the energetic little village, you will browse galleries that showcase stunning art and stalls that sell intricate goods. The creative displays will passionately embrace your every interest. After exploring all the mill has to offer, you will meet your private transfer for a guided tour of the greater Cape Town area. You will embark on a tour of the Cape Peninsula that is equal insightful as it is beautiful. Along the extensive coastal route, you will discover captivating vistas and significant points of interest in addition to exploring the city’s famous suburbs as your knowledgeable guide articulates the remarkable history of the Cape. The highlights of this tour are too many and too superb to capture in perfect detail. However, you and your loved will journey along the rugged Chapman’s Peak route with picture-perfect sights of the marvelous mountain range where you will wade in the waters with African penguins at Boulders Beach. The culmination of the tour will be a pivotal stop at the magnificent Cape of Good Hope. The destination, which is encompassed by striking mountains and deep blue flowing oceans, will serve up the most beautiful moments. Here, at the southernmost tip of Africa, you will witness the endearing meeting point of the Atlantic and Indian Oceans. You will continue on your loveable coastal tour of the regions astounding heritage sites before making your way back to your hotel. Before the sun fades and the moon illuminates the sky, you will venture to Cape Town’s pristine promenade. You and your partner will hop on bicycles and enjoy a stately ride along the Sea Point promenade. With the wind in your hair and all worries behind you, the delightful cruise will invigorate your bodies and minds. You will park your bicycles at the Sea Point junction and marvel at the immaculate African sunset by the sea. After which, you will stroll to a coveted restaurant nearby for a gourmet multiple course candlelit meal.

dayInfo.title: Franschhoek – Take Flight over the Winelands
dayInfo.description: You will wake early on your fourth day before the sun has risen for another ravishing morning of romantic adventure. You will journey, via private transfer, to the famous Stellenbosch area. Here, you and your partner will board a 2-person private hot-air balloon. The balloon will rumble into gear at sunrise, and you will slowly fly up above the lush green fields. At nearly 1,000 feet in the air, you will be astounded at the surreal vistas of the vast Western Cape region. In the distance, Table Mountain will show off its might, and vineyards will creep across the land below. It will be a sight to behold, and you will capture the dream-like experience throughout your journey, especially on this hot air balloon ride. You will complete the 60-minute voyage in true style with a celebratory glass of exquisite sparkling wine for when you land. After which, you will be treated to a delectable breakfast at a stylish estate that will be set amongst the gorgeous vineyards. After breakfast, you will delight in a tour of Stellenbosch’s rich heritage with an inside look at the incredible Dutch-colonial architecture. You will be completely engrossed by the small town’s old-world charm. Later today, you will encounter the renowned area's finest wines where a private wine tour of the most elite estates will allow you to bask in luxury as you sip on premier vintages and blends. Your guided taste tour will include insightful knowledge on the history of winemaking in the area as well as a behind-the-scenes look at some of the leading estates’ winemaking processes. On this expedition, you will uncover the secrets that make Stellenbosch so special. In the late afternoon, you will transfer to your luxury accommodation in the Franschhoek Valley. This sought-after destination is home to more of Western Cape’s prestigious age-old wine farms and will be teeming with wildlife. The incredible destination will also offer a wealth of history to explore. The following day, you will share in all of it and more, and this evening, you may take the opportunity to unwind together. Soak up the surroundings and delve into an elegant Michelin-starred dinner to bring the gorgeous day to an end.

dayInfo.title: Franschhoek – A Vintage Journey like No Other
dayInfo.description: You will begin your morning with a marvelous breakfast before encountering the wondrous natural Franschhoek environment. A chauffeur-driven vintage car will be waiting for you at the lobby after your breakfast. You will step inside the tasteful vehicle for a dignified private tour of the surrounding area that will be led by your experienced guide. You will journey along the distinguished Franschhoek Pass and view the destination from stunning heights. Shortly after, you will arrive at the Valley’s impressive Nature Reserve for an intimate walk with spectacular wildlife sightings. While you have enjoyed the world-class wines at Stellenbosch’s premier estates, the Franschhoek Valley has an impressive collection of its own. This afternoon, you will visit the destination’s leading estate for an exquisite lunch, wine tasting experience, and cellar tour. As you indulge in each glass, you will let the nature around you sweep both of you away. The blissful spectacles of the vast green fields and rugged mountain ranges will instill calm within. With a glass or two of outstanding sparkling wine to cap off the afternoon, you will leave completely refreshed. Afterward, you will stop by a historical museum and monument, which pay tribute to the French Huguenot people that settled in the area decades ago. The beautiful displays valiantly represent the people and their influence over the region. After learning more about South African heritage, you will transfer to an exceptional restaurant for a multiple-course, gourmet meal. The delicious food will be sure to excite your palate with unique, tasty, and local flavors. Your luxury dinner will be complete with panoramic views of the sunset from the comfort of your elegant table amid the gardens.

dayInfo.title: Cape Town – Living the Luxurious Farm Life
dayInfo.description: Located in the superbly beautiful hamlet of Simondium lies a luxurious farm, which is an absolute must for your romantic Cape Town getaway. After breakfast, you will transfer to the beautiful farm for your incredibly intimate and invigorating day. The farm is driven by deeply-rooted philosophies of sustainability and diversity, and every facet of the organization works towards the betterment of nature and human wellbeing. Thus, their array of activities will be geared towards the enlightening and fulfilling of guests. You and your loved one will have the opportunity to explore the enticing activities of your choosing, from the ancient art of oil pressing and preserving olives to an herbal blending tea workshop. The highly educational experiences will cater to all sorts of preferences. If you wish to skip the enthralling activities, then a garden tour of their rich botanical tapestry will also be available. This journey will excite all of your senses as you browse, pick, smell, and taste the extraordinary grown plant life while hearing the serene sounds of nature around you. After your chosen activity, you will enjoy a magnificent lunch at the farm. Intricately prepared using freshly grown ingredients, the award-winning restaurant’s delectable food will captivate you as you share the experience with one another. This will leave a taste on your palate that you will want with every meal. Later this afternoon, you will transfer back to the bustling city of Cape Town for some time to unwind. Here, you will check-in to your luxurious guesthouse in the charmingly elegant suburb of Llandudno. This popular, yet off the beaten track beach offers luxury living amongst the most tranquil seaside setting. In the evening, you will transfer to the vibrant streets of Clifton Beach for first-class cocktails and a gourmet meal. You will brush shoulders with Cape Town’s elite as you enjoy fun-filled sundowners by the sea.

dayInfo.title: Cape Town – Cape Town's Best Kept Secrets
dayInfo.description: Your final full day in Cape Town will be spent exploring the pristine Blue Flag beaches that are set along the western coastline of the city. You will enjoy breakfast in Llandudno before spending a few hours on its immaculate white sand. If you are brave enough to embrace the refreshing waters, then you can delight in a swim in the crystal-clear Atlantic Ocean. Then, you will transfer to a few of Cape Town’s most coveted hideaway beaches. You will live like a local at these rare gems as you relax in the sun with next to no crowds. You will tuck into an exceptional meal at one of Cape Town’s revered seafood restaurants nearby before exploring more of the seaside. In the afternoon, return home to slip into something comfortable. From your guesthouse, you will transfer to the base of the Lion’s Head. The impressive mountain, which sits between Table Mountain and Signal Hill, offers couples one of the most romantic views from its peaks. Together, you will hike up the winding trail that winds around the mountain. You will arrive at the top and be met with impeccable vistas of Cape Town. From here, you and your partner will capture lifelong memories of your incredible stay in Cape Town. You will witness the remarkable grandeur of the mountain that cannot be seen anywhere else in the world. Here, you will stand on what seems to be the edge of the world as you snap photos of you looking down below. As the sun sets, you will see the stars break through the blue sky, and within minutes, the sky will be lit up by the twinkling stars, and you will feel worlds away. After taking it all in, you will slowly make your way down the mountain and transfer to a gorgeous restaurant in the city center. Here, you will enjoy another Michelin-starred meal to bring the perfect romantic getaway to an end. You will return to your luxury accommodation for one last night next to the serene seaside environment.

dayInfo.title: Cape Town – A Breakfast Fit for a King and Queen
dayInfo.description: In the morning of your final day, you will venture to the heart of the city to soak up the exuberant energy and enjoy an elaborate breakfast at a revered restaurant. As you dine in comfort on elegant meals, you should take some time to reminisce about your romantic getaway together. You will capture a few last gorgeous pictures before you leave the vibrant city. You will wonder why time flew by so fast but the memories and moments will never be forgotten. With your bags and belongings packed safe and sound with your private transfer, you will be met shortly after your breakfast and journey to the airport. Stunning Cape Town will eagerly await your next visit.
